wikipedia_page.main: Gerald Michael Orlando Bridgeman, 6th Earl of Bradford, TD, DL, JP (29 September 1911 – 30 August 1981), styled Viscount Newport between 1915 and 1957, was a British peer and soldier.

response: *Gerald Bridgeman, 6th Earl of Bradford (1911–1981), president of the Country Landowners' Association

link_mentions.page: Gerald Michael Orlando Bridgeman, 6th Earl of Bradford
Index of World War II articles (G)

response: Bradford is the son of Gerald Bridgeman, 6th Earl of Bradford, and Mary Willoughby Montgomery. He was educated at St. Ronan's School, Hawkhurst, and Harrow School, just outside London, and Trinity College, Cambridge, where he graduated with a Bachelor of Arts in 1969 and a Master of Arts in 1973. He succeeded to his father's title in 1981.
